page.description: Specify if the button list should fill its defined width.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Fill width]* property can be used to render all options in a CheckBox control with *[ui:Render as Button List]* enabled the same width.

section.tip: When the *[ui:Fill width]* property is checked, you may also want to set the *[link:Control width@UX Control Field Properties Width]* to 100%.

section.description: The image below shows a CheckBox control rendered as a button list and "Horizontal" *[link:Orientation@ux checkbox orientation]*. The CheckBox control's width has also been set to 100%.
When *[ui:Fill width]* is checked, the button list expands to fill the frame.
